item.title: About
item.description: Hi ! I am Mukund Kedia, a cybersecurity consultant. I am interested in cybersecurity and coding. My skills include Web, API and Thick client pentesting and I am eager to further add pentesting skills in domains like Mobile, Network, etc. I want to explore other domains in cyber security as well and therefore started to learn about Reverse Engineering recently and hope to improve significantly in this field with focus on Malware Analysis.
